title: NBA playoffs, Jimmy Garoppolo, Kevin Durant
itunes:title: NBA playoffs, Jimmy Garoppolo, Kevin Durant
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb explains why the NBA's return is a poor plan, why he doesn't think Jimmy Garoppolo can be an all time great, and why Kevin Durant should return for the playoffs. Guests include Sam Amick, Danny Manning, and Greg Jennings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
